sentences.sentence: Last summer was the wettest on record.
sentences.translation: 去年夏天是有记录以来降雨量最大的。

sentences.sentence: It was the wettest October for many years.
sentences.translation: 这是多年来下雨最多的一个十月份。

sentences.sentence: It was the wettest October in many years.
sentences.translation: 多年来十月份从来没下过这么多雨。
